title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 26 May 2009 - XWiki
content:
fmancinelli left at 00:05 ()

florinciu left at 01:58 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:09): sdumitriu: Hi,  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 02:09): Hi tharindu  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:09): I am trying to read the resource as org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils.toString(this.getClass().getResourceAsStream("/LoginListener.groovy"))  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:10): but its giving null pointer exception  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:10): but file is in /test/resources folder  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:11): what path it looks for when I call that method ?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 02:11): It should work fine  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:11): source is in /src/it folder  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 02:11): How do you run the test?  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:11): mvn install -Dpattern=LoginObservationTest  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:12): after building other xwiki-core, web/standard and enterprise  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:12): I just used some try catch around at printed the stacktrace  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:13): it is haulting because of NullPointerException  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 02:15): When you say test/resources, you mean src/test/resources, right?  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:16): yes  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:16): sorry  
tharindu - (26/05/2009 02:16): its src/test/resources

tachirei left #xwiki at 13:19  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 13:24  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:27): Has anybody seen alexmaru?  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 13:27  
asyd - (26/05/2009 13:32): !seen alexmaru  
asyd - (26/05/2009 13:32): ah no  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:36): alexxed ???  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:37): No, I don't think so  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:37): ok :)  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:37): alexxed: You're not alexmaru, are you?  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:37): HI   
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:37): Hi arunreddy\_\_  
alexxed - (26/05/2009 13:37): no  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:38): hey, have one small doubt. Want to discuss about my project structure.   
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:39): Say  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:39): Vincent suggested me to come up with one project called xwiki-importer in platform/core and one more in applications.  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:39): platform/appications  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:39): if thats the case. how should i go with it.  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:40): Well, you should create two modules (or even more later) in your sandbox  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:42): am i supposed to go with..    
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:42): platform/core/xwiki-importer  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:42): and same for platform/applications/ ---  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:42): so on ?  
tharindu joined #xwiki at 13:44  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:44): What do you mean "go with"?  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:45): can i create two maven projects with those structure  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:45): in my gsoc/importexport space  
alexmaru joined #xwiki at 13:46  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:48): Hi alex  
alexmaru - (26/05/2009 13:48): hi  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:48): No, create:  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:48): sandbox/gsoc/importexport/xwiki-core-importer  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:48): sandbox/gsoc/importexport/xwiki-application-importer  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:50): OK, Thanks.  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:51): They will be moved to the correct location when they graduate from the sandbox  
alexmaru left at 13:51 ("good bye")  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:53): oh nice. :)  .. can i have a same group id for both.. just wanted to confirm.. org.xwiki.importer   
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:54): The group id should be org.xwiki.platform  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 13:54): hi sdumitriu!  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:54): Hi CristinaS  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:54): ok  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 13:55): which should be the group  id for my project?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:55): org.xwiki.xoo  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:55): It's not part of the platform  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 13:56): anamarias: Yours should be org.xwiki.platform, too  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 13:56): ok  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 13:56): not org.xwiki.opensocial ?  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 13:56): ah, the group id  
arunreddy\_\_ - (26/05/2009 13:56): anamarias : Nice post. :)  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 13:57): thanks arunreddy\_\_ ?)  
arunreddy\_\_ is now known as arunreddy ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))  
tachirei left #xwiki at 13:59  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:01): How was eliberatica?  
vnkatesh joined #xwiki at 14:01  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:01): nice :) we met jerome , cati , anca and eduard  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:02): very nice because we got to meet the guys/gals in Iasi  
vnkatesh - (26/05/2009 14:02): :)  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:02): we have also xwiki pens  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:02): from organizational point of view, they should really take into account all the bad feedback this year   
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:03): we also got to see some Agile / TDD presentations, which were helpful as we ll work with them  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:04): got a book from OReilly 40% off ?)  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:06): we both got the same book : "Beautiful Architecture"  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:06): and i hope it will be useful for this summer  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:07): should I leave the artifactId to \*xwiki-opensocial\* and only change the groupId to \*org.xwiki.platform\* ?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:07): Yes  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:08): will it work if i just edit the pom.xml ?  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:09): how often should we commit our code?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:09): anamarias: Yes  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:10): CristinaS: daily  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:10): ok  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:10): nice  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:12): I didn't commit yesterday .. i thought I have to wait more  
rrodriguez left at 14:13 ()  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:13): something else, when I commit it also adds in the changes all the files and directories in /target (created at build time) , a .classpath and a .project file. should they be committed or not ?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:13): No  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:13): Wait a bit  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:14): this files are created from eclipse..  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:14): .classpath and .project  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:14): the ones in target are created when you build the project with mvn  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:15): yes, sure  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:16): http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DevelopmentPractices#HSubversionconfigurationandlineendings  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:16): "Please add the..."  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 14:18  
tachirei - (26/05/2009 14:22): mflorea: I have some problems with syntax switching from xwiki2.0 to XHTML, how can I see the XHTML created by the WYSIWYG?  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:22): it is written that we have to add a copyright header for the xml files.. i have some kind of xml files for the menus description and others that are necessary for OO like description   
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:23): should I put the copyright header only for the menus description or for all the files?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:23): It's best to put it everywhere  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:24): But it's OK if you don't for the moment  
mflorea - (26/05/2009 14:25): tachirei: add &debug to the query string and you're get some plain text areas below the editor. the first has uncleaned HTML, the second has cleaned XHTML, the third has wiki syntax and the last has rendering events  
tachirei - (26/05/2009 14:26): ok   
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:26): and another problem .. my pom files are a little big .. because I didn;t developed the plugin, I wanted to create the files manually in order to make the extension to work .. it's ok if I work in this way for the moment?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:30): Yes  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:31): We have some pretty big poms ourselves  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 14:32): ok  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 14:38): what should I use to display xml content (with <tags>?) ? if i insert them as they are, i only see the text in them (<tag>text</tag>) in view mode. I tried {pre}{/pre} but they mess up the syntax on the next edit. I could use escape for each <, > but that looks like a lot of work  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:40): Try {code} ... {code}  
vnkatesh left #xwiki at 14:40  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 14:40): Or, manually replace < with <  
tachirei left #xwiki at 14:54

tachirei left #xwiki at 14:58

rrodriguez left at 15:34 ()  
rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 15:37  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 15:49  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 15:50): arunreddy: You should create an aggregator pom.xml inside importexport  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 15:51): Aggregator pom.xml ?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 15:51): Look at http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/trunks/pom.xml for an example  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 15:52): 2. Add the copyright header in the pom files  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 15:53): 3. Make the pom for the application an actual xar pom, for example http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/xwiki-applications/trunk/tag/pom.xml  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 15:53): 4. Make a blog post about this  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 15:53): :)  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 15:57): Sure  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 15:57): :)  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 16:03): why doesn't our projects have a /trunk directory ?  
florinciu - (26/05/2009 16:09): because you don't have a release cycle and you don't need multiple branches for now  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 16:10): This is how sandbox projects work  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 16:10): Indeed, they don't have releases to go into /tags/, so there's no need to have /trunk/  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 16:11): i see, thanks  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 16:11  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 16:15): Who wants to learn git?  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 16:15): me :)  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 16:15): I've been writing a "tutorial" for the past few days  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 16:16): Adding the final touches, and I'll post it online  
asyd - (26/05/2009 16:17): sdumitriu: I'm also interest, so hl me when you'll post the link ;p  
asyd - (26/05/2009 16:17): thanks :)  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 16:17): Sure  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 16:17): Me too.!  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 16:17): can we use git for gsoc?   
anamarias - (26/05/2009 16:19): me too :)  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 16:20): Yes  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 16:20): is it much better than svn ?  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 16:21): you can commit when you are offline  
anamarias - (26/05/2009 16:21): cool  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 16:22): it is not any more centralized  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 16:22): IMHO, it is much much better than svn  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 16:22): But that's a matter of personal taste, I'm sure not everybody agrees  
tachirei - (26/05/2009 16:23): what about perforce vs git?  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 16:24): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4XpnKHJAok8 .. Linus presentation of git  at Google  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 16:25): it's funny  
rrodriguez left at 16:28 ()  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 16:42): i prefer perforce to git :)  
tharindu joined #xwiki at 16:55  
alexxed left at 17:02 ("Leaving.")  
rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 17:03  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 17:35): sdumitriu: Small doubt in regards to pom.xml  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 17:36): should i add the details of <parent> ---  </parent>  inside pom.xml  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 17:37): Yes  
jk\_work joined #xwiki at 17:38  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 17:39): ok  
lucaa left at 17:44 ("Leaving.")  
tachirei left #xwiki at 17:45  
jk\_work left at 17:48 ()  
alexmaru joined #xwiki at 17:51  
jvelociter left at 18:09 ()  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 18:10): http://incubator.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/UsingGit  
CristinaS - (26/05/2009 18:12): thanks  
alexmaru - (26/05/2009 18:13): we're going to use git and not svn from now on?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 18:13): That's your choice  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 18:13): The server is still on svn  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 18:13): But I like the way git works with branches  
alexmaru - (26/05/2009 18:14): oki  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 18:14): It's just a bridge between full git and our server  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 18:15  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 18:16): So, if you feel more comfortable with svn, just continue to use it  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 18:18): sdumitriu : Your Op Sys is Gentoo ?  :)  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 18:21): Yes

jvelociter joined #xwiki at 18:44

alexmaru - (26/05/2009 18:56): psih is her second faculty? :P  
florinciu left at 18:56 ("ChatZilla 0.9.84 [Firefox 3.0.10/2009042316]")  
sdumitriu1 joined #xwiki at 18:56  
sdumitriu left at 18:57 (Nick collision from services.)  
sdumitriu1 is now known as sdumitriu ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))  
KermitTheFragger left at 18:58 ("Leaving")  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:20): Hi tharindu  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:20): Did you solve the NPE problem?  
arunreddy left at 19:22 (Remote closed the connection)  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 19:24  
glerouge left at 19:39 ("Gone chasing a unicorn in the twilight zone")  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:41): sdumitriu : HI  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:41): Hi arunreddy  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:41): What's up?  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:42): The modules under platform/applications  are different compared to others  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:42): they dont have any groupId   
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:43): If the parent has a group id, it's enough  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:43): It's considered the same as the parent  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:43): in that case how to create the maven project.  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:43): Copy the pom and edit it  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:44): Or generate a default one and edit it  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:44): Delete the unwanted and create new directories manually ?  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:45): And coming to SCM. Can i give the link to sandbox - importexport link .?  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:47): Yes  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:48): But for the moment it's better to just remove the scm configuration  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:49): OK  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:49): Can i use git to access sandbox- importexport  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:50): Yes  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:51): Use:  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:51): git svn clone --username=arun https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/sandbox/gsoc/importexport/  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:51): Oh ran into some trouble  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:52): I manually changed the files locally.. When i tried to svn commit. .. it says -- svn: Delta source ended unexpectedly  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:52): What did you change?  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:53): all the subfolders in src/  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:53): deleted few and added few.  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:55): Try:  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 19:55): svn up  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 19:58): it says -- svn: Working copy path 'src' does not exist in repository  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 20:00): cd ..  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 20:00): svn up  
alexmaru left at 20:02 ("good bye")  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 20:07): Some How Deleted the entire Stuff and recreated.  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 20:07): :)  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 20:08): Try using git, it's simpler  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 20:08): With svn you have to be careful when moving things around  
sdumitriu - (26/05/2009 20:08): You must use svn move for that, otherwise it breaks  
mflorea left at 20:09 ("Leaving")  
arunreddy - (26/05/2009 20:10): Yeah, Thats the next thing am going to do. After making neccesary changes to pom.xml
